General.Name: Zhejiang Zone King Environmental Sci&Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Zone-King Environmental Sci&Tech Co., Ltd. provides various environmental protection services. The company offers soil and groundwater restoration, water pollution control, water body restoration, waste gas treatment, solid waste treatment, and other services, as well as municipal engineering, industrial wastewater, and river ecological treatment. It also engages in sales and service of environmentally friendly products, such as water pumps, agitators, flow pushers, fans, ozone systems, and other equipment; and environmental protection equipment installation, commissioning, repair, maintenance, transformation, and other services, as well as project technical scheme design, project implementation and risk control, and continuous management consulting services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No.536, Sanli Times Square, Hangzhou, China, 310014
